text.p: These are the leading stories in the Sarajevo press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Nationalist SDA and HDZ parties meet behind closed doors in Sarajevo on Tuesday to discuss upcoming elections. They agree to provide each other with "fair conditions" for campaigning.

-Serbian President Slobodan Milosevic is accused of war crimes by the Bosnian Institute for Research of Crimes against Humanity and International law and the Croatian Centre for Genocide and War Victims. -
